explains: adj. 较少的；次要的；更小的
adv. 较少地；更小地；不及
wordGroup: to a lesser extent 在较小程度上

sentences.en: People voted for him as the lesser of two evils.
sentences.cn: 人们投票选他只是出于两害相权取其轻罢了。

sentences.en: Students played the lesser parts and sang in the chorus.
sentences.cn: 学生们扮演了一些次要角色，并参加了合唱团的演唱。

sentences.en: He was encouraged to plead guilty to the lesser offence.
sentences.cn: 有人怂恿他供认犯了那个较轻的罪行。
